Changed location platform detection to device_type

* This prevents code duplicating and a consistently on provider
    - If we use Google for push we should use google for location
    - If we use HMS for push we should use HMS for location.

Removed hms:base and agconnect-core

* These are already part of hms:lcation and hms:push
   - The specifc version is mis-matched with agconnect-core causing internal NPE errors
   - This fixes the test failing as well.

Added missing huaweiFusedLocationClient null check

* Also cleaned up ShadowLocationController mocking
   - This is driven by OSUtil now
* Fixed shouldRegisterWhenPromptingAfterInit_Huawei
   - It was using FCM instead of HMS for the push part of the test.
